CREATE PROCEDURE $procedure_name$
    @parameter_name AS INT
-- WITH ENCRYPTION, RECOMPILE, EXECUTE AS CALLER|SELF|OWNER| 'user_name'
AS
BEGIN
    $CURSOR$
END
GO
